heading: HR01824
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS AND THE OVERSIGHT COMMITTEE ON CUSTOMS MODERNIZATION AND TARIFF ACT TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE POSSIBLE VIOLATIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10863 OR THE CUSTOMS MODERNIZATION AND TARIFF ACT (CMTA) IN CONNECTION WITH THE ALLEGED UNAUTHORIZED WITHDRAWAL OF 105 CONTAINERS FROM THE PORT OF MANILA, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF ADDRESSING POTENTIAL LOSS IN GOVERNMENT REVENUE
status: Pending with the Committee on WAYS AND MEANS since 2018-05-23
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01824
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS AND THE OVERSIGHT COMMITTEE ON CUSTOMS MODERNIZATION AND TARIFF ACT TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE POSSIBLE VIOLATIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10863 OR THE CUSTOMS MODERNIZATION AND TARIFF ACT (CMTA) IN CONNECTION WITH THE ALLEGED UNAUTHORIZED WITHDRAWAL OF 105 CONTAINERS FROM THE PORT OF MANILA, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF ADDRESSING POTENTIAL LOSS IN GOVERNMENT REVENUE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SUANSING, HORACIO JR. P.
DATE FILED : 2018-04-19
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS ON 2018-05-23
